downloadTitle: Live Communications Server 2005 Document: Supportability Guide
downloadDescription: This document identifies supported configurations for Microsoft® Office Live Communications Server 2005, Live Communications Server 2005with Service Pack 1 (SP1), and Microsoft Office Communicator Web Access.
detailsSection:
This document identifies supported configurations for Microsoft® Office Live Communications Server 2005, Live Communications Server 2005with Service Pack 1 (SP1), and Microsoft Office Communicator Web Access.
This document identifies supported configurations for Microsoft® Office Live Communications Server 2005, Live Communications Server 2005with Service Pack 1 (SP1), and Microsoft Office Communicator Web Access. Client support is also identified.
systemRequirementsSection:
• This download works with the following Office applications:
    • Microsoft Office Word 2003
    • Microsoft Word 2002
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:
  1. Download the file by clicking the Download button (above) and saving the file to your hard disk.
  2. Double-click the LCS_2005_Supported.doc file on your hard disk to open the document.
Instructions for use:

After you install this download, open the guide as you typically would.

To remove this download:

To remove the download file, delete the file LCS_2005_Supported.doc.
